text: 10 days unless you've set the policy/registry key for 30. I did that on a sample workstation, was messing around with various registry keys to get a 10 machine that wasn't supposed to support 11 to be offered 11. I uninstalled the 11 and it reverted back to 10. Any chance these folks were messing with registry keys? %40b47466c0.com
